name: Cubic 2.0
description:
"Cubic 2.0" is a better version of my previous game called  "Cubic". 

The Goal of this game is to get all Upgrades at max level.

You get coins by killing enemies. 

My Website : https://keycodes.tk

Controls :

 W A S D - Movement

 I - Status

B - Shop

Credits :

Music - Made by DDRKirby - https://ddrkirbyisq.bandcamp.com
